backend/main.mo: Defines clinic configs, patient submissions, user profiles, and access control logic with multiple data types and authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to impacted source files, components, test IDs, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten 1–2 sentence summaries for all frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and extensive OKLCH-based color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with ThemeProvider and Toaster components.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with loading states, auto-retry behavior, and patient‑page labeling rules.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting first‑time authenticated users to save their profile name, with validation and loading states.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProtectedRo: Route guard enforcing authentication, showing a medical‑team access screen, and injecting profile setup when logged in.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Dashbo: Search and date filter UI component with icons and styled inputs for dashboard filtering.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Export: Exports filtered patient submissions to a CSV file using parsed context fields.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Submis: Displays a list of patient submissions with basic details and selection handling.
frontend/src/components/forms/FormSectio: Styled container component for grouping form sections.
frontend/src/components/forms/RequiredMa: Renders a red asterisk indicating a required field.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppFooter: Shows footer with copyright and a referral link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Renders the navigation header with branding, login, and patient/team view switching.
App layout wrapper including header, main content area, and footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useClinicTeam.ts: Provides hooks to fetch and update clinic team member lists via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Minimal helper exposing actor query state for compatibility.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmissions.ts: Hooks for fetching, submitting, and updating patient submissions through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Hooks for retrieving and saving the current user's profile via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styling with light/dark theme variables and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app, wrapping it with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays all patient submissions with search, date filtering, export, and navigation to team view.
frontend/src/pages/ExamSuccessPage.tsx: Shows exam completion confirmation, extracts patient name, and links to Google Maps for reviews.
frontend/src/pages/PatientFormPage.tsx: Handles patient intake form submission, builds a submission payload, and navigates to a success page.
frontend/src/pages/SubmissionSuccessPage: Simple confirmation page shown after a registration is submitted.
frontend/src/pages/TeamManagementPage.ts: Loads a selected patient submission, extracts fields, allows medical updates, and saves changes via updateSubmission.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters and session-backed values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme colors, animations, typography, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Stores project state, requirements, architectural notes, and known issues for rebuilding the app using IC stack while preserving existing flows. Includes feature definitions, access rules, and a noted form submission failure.
